ygData.subject: Re: Small pyramids
ygData.msgSnippet: No, he means the wizard transporters.  He s asking because it s a question on the guide application that he apparently doesn t know the answer to. ...
ygData.messageBody:
No, he means the wizard transporters. He's asking because it's a question
on the guide application that he apparently doesn't know the answer to.


>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Small pyramids
>Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 09:35:47 PDT
>
>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>>What are the small pyramid shapes spread out across Norrath called >(not
>>the road markers)? Has anyone seen these and know what they are >used for?
>>
>>Thanks in advance,
>>
>>Chris aka Thunderheart
>>Level 19
>>Wood-Elf
>>Druid
>>Innoruuk server
>
>If you mean the actual pyramids (they look like Aztec pyramids) that you
>find everywhere, they're undead generators (like the Undead Runes but with
>a
>slower regen rate).
>
>
